website_summaries.verdict: Simple, inexpensive, and quality-made, this is a handy formula dispenser with a user-friendly design. Easy to access the formula; great for babies (and caretakers) on the go.
pros: Includes three compartments for formula, and has a spout for easy pouring
Can be washed in the dishwasher
Serves as a snack dispenser later on
cons: There are no ounce markings for formula powder storage, but this issue is easily resolved if you pre-measure formula powder or mix it at home

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at first but simplicity is best in this scenario
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but simplicity is best in this scenario. I'm so glad I purchased this. I've been having issues with switching from breastmilk to formula and one of my main issues with being out and about. Who wants to carry that big clunky canister with them wherever they go?! Not ME! This little guy is perfect... and three servings lasted us hours out and about at the zoo. No mess, no confusion. Nothing awkward. And it's pretty discrete, for someone like me who still feels a little judged when I feed my child formula.
customer_reviews.author: Ogaillard

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its purpose...
customer_reviews.text: It serves the general purpose. A little bigger than expected, so doesn't fit as nicely in a bag as I thought it would. It's also a little difficult to get the top off for refilling. The snap dispenser top opens easily so it may pop open in your bag and spill (hasn't happened to me yet, but it seems possible).
customer_reviews.author: SuperMommy3x

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for multiple uses, not just formula.
customer_reviews.text: I like this formula dispenser for the reason some people dislike it. I like that it is a little larger than most because in the future I will be able to store snacks like cereal puffs or yogurt melts. I love the sleek design and the clear compartments which let me see exactly what is inside. The top clicks nice and tight so I don’t have to worry about anything spilling. Great product. I have a picture comparing this and the dr Browns formula dispenser. But work great, but I find the joovy dispenser more aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I originally did not like it, but honestly between the 3 I own, oxo, munchkin and this one, this is my favorite. It's easier to pack on the go and also easy to access and dispense.
customer_reviews.author: sl_panda

customer_reviews.title: Best option we've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best option we've tried. Contains a good amount of formula, fits well in the diaper bag (since it is oblong rather than squat) and can be used one handed. The only downside is the lid is on very tight, so it's hard to open without spilling if you are refilling a partially full container (e.g. Two of the sections have formula and you'd like to refill the third). on the flip side, the lid is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Patty Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Cute design, user friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser! I took away a star because unless secured in a bag, it can have some spillage between the containers. When I tossed it in the bag, I didn’t think about that fact, so I had one section with a lot of power and one with hardly any. One huge pro for me was that it clicks into place between each section so it doesn’t move when your shaking out all the formula. My other one you have to be careful because it just turns and in my half asleep state I poured when it was between the two sections and got way to much powder.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P

customer_reviews.title: Great powder formula dispenser for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient powder formula holder while on the go! We keep this in our diaper bag. The only reason I’m giving 4 instead of 5 stars is when I pour the powder into a bottle, it’s a little challenging to get every bit of the powder out - a little always seems to get stuck so I have to shake or move it around to empty completely. But overall, would recommend! This is my first formula dispenser I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Carly C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula dispenser! The size is great and it looks stylish (which I love) I saw a lot of people complaining about the size but I think it’s perfect and I’m more than glad I went with this option.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: This formula dispenser works great! I originally was using the single portion Tommee ...
customer_reviews.text: This formula dispenser works great! I originally was using the single portion Tommee Tippee formula dispenser but once my daughter started eating more I could not fit all of the formula in those. This dispenser has been great and I ended up buying a second one when I need to double up for traveling. The dispenser is very easy to use, easy to clean and it has never spilled or leaked anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Konecne

customer_reviews.title: Although it's a little bulky; its a great dispenser. I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this formula dispenser. It's very strong and so far has been great! I would say you can get around 9-12 scoops of formula in each section (it consists of 3 sections) and the opening of the dispenser is small enough to fit into the neck of the milk bottle. The only concern I had is sometimes you have to tap the dispenser on the side to get all the formula out of the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi_89

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot of product
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too big and fits awkward in the diaper bag, but the lid is secure and the dispenser whole is easy to pour from. What would make this perfect is if it had oz measurements for powder. We kept 6, 4, and 2 oz in it, and I used permanent marker to write on the plastic. This allowed us different oz combinations based on baby's needs. It is good for keeping snacks, but you have to remove the lid because even puffs won't come out of the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the diaper bag when we need to take a bottle along for an outing, but we actually have ended up keeping it in the nursery for nighttime bottles- much easier than trying to measure out scoops from the formula canister in the dark with a hungry baby. Will likely order a second one for the diaper bag! The cap can be a little finicky to turn to get to the next compartment sometimes, but usually isn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great for protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: I pack my luch daily and I always have several plant based protein shakes at work. I no longer have to use plastic bags to store my powders in my lunch bag. It has 3 none spill compartments. I absolutely love using it daily. It saves time and it is practical
customer_reviews.author: Caligirlzrock

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to get all the formula out of one ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get all the formula out of one of these compartments. You really have to tip and tap in many angles ,which leads to a mess (not to mention incorrect amount)
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bruno

customer_reviews.title: The Joovy is Groovy, lol.
customer_reviews.text: I like this better than any of the other formula dispensers I've used. It's functionally and aesthetically better. It also seems more resilient/sturdy, but I don't know. I love the design, and plan on keeping this for baby's snacks when baby is no longer taking formula.
customer_reviews.author: RaeTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: LIFE. SAVER. (written by a dad)
customer_reviews.text: Tired of hearing your child scream while measuring and scooping formula in public?? So is everyone else!!! Do yourself a favor and buy this thing. It makes mixing bottles on the fly SO much easier. Pop the lid, dump it in water, shake and shazam. This container has never spilled (its been dropped more times than I can count), it is easy to clean, and THERE IS NO LINGERING SMELL 🙌🏼🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: TheRelatableReviewer

customer_reviews.title: The Bees Knees
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! I was using little baggies to travel with formula and this has changed my world. I did read a lot of reviews on other kinds and I’m so happy I went with this one! It is easy to swivel between the different compartments. Minimal residue left behind after pouring. I’ve had no issues with the lid whatsoever. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: some were good some were not
customer_reviews.text: This product I bought after reading the reviews, some were good some were not. I also have the Dr. Drowns formula dispenser, and I love it. this one is bigger and for most it was a turnoff. I love the fact that I can put snack in one of the compartments, his oatmeal in another if we leave early and milk in the third one. it has different uses and it is a little on the "longer side" height wise, but overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, picture is the dispenser next to a 9oz glass dr browns bottle
customer_reviews.author: Yoambre

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a week ago and already used multiple times. Easy to remove lid and fill. The lid also spins very easily. Overall happy with the product. I give it 4 stars because the lid does seem a bit loose so I keep a rubber band around it when putting in the diaper bag. Maybe it wouldn’t pop off but I’m not willing to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of buying more.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for more than formula. We put crunchies, cheerios, and puffs in it too. Works great although the crunchies can be tricky to get out (not complaining because I know that's not what it's designed for). The only downfall is that it takes awhile to dry inside the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, washes easily. Just be aware that formula will transfer from one division to the other if you turn it upside down and depending on where the spout on the top is positioned. There's really no way to prevent this - I just kept it right side up in diaper bag pocket, and there were no issues. Use it for goldfish or cheerios when kid has outgrown formula.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzmine

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the appearance of this dispenser and the function is good as well. While it is easy to use, I do wish that it had a smaller lip around the dispensing hole. I have to rotate the container around and often spill a small amount in the process. While this is annoying, it's not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Abbotta

customer_reviews.title: Love the the capacity it holds
customer_reviews.text: Love how big this container is. My little one takes 5 scoops at a time now and it’s hard to fit that in the smaller containers. This one holds 5 scoops easily with room available I’m each compartment . I can also add snacks on the other side if I wanted to. It’s very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Terry

customer_reviews.title: Stick to using this for formula...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using it for formula, but for dispensing my powdered energy drink. This dispenser doesn't let all the powder out and I've seen some mixing at the top where it doesn't seal completely. Probably not a problem when using formula, but for my intent, its just ok.
customer_reviews.author: The Virginia Millers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect formula dispenser for parents on the go! This product works exactly how it is supposed to. I love how clear the sides are so that I can make sure that all of the powder is out when dispensing. It makes traveling so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the size and shape of this one to use on the go. It fits into an interior pocket of our diaper bag easily. The one downside of it is that the pour spout is so big that it’s easy to accidentally spill formula powder when you’re trying to get it into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Formula! Works good paired with comotomo!
customer_reviews.text: Great for toting and pre-measuring baby Formula! Only flaw would be formula gets stuck on flat lip around opening hole. Nothing that extra shaking and finger slapping can't get out after a little work! Cute for comotomo bottles!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaKat

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is so convenient! I read lots of reviews and some were negative. I personally didn’t agree with any bad reviews on this. This kid is easy to move around and to get on and off. We have never had a spill and it empties easily into small bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Everything is lovely except how it pours out. You have to shake it around a bit to get the last bits of formula and sometimes that results in getting it on the table instead of the bottle 🤷🏻‍♀️ Can’t wait to be able to use these as a snack dispenser!! It’ll work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Shurrie

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula holder. After reading reviews I opted to order this one because it looked a little nicer and sturdier. It lived up to my expectations! My only small complaint is that it is a little bulky but I think that is just something you’ll run into with any formula holder.
customer_reviews.author: ALec

customer_reviews.title: Good when it lasted, but wears down quickly and makes the product more of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Product was good for a couple of uses. After awhile the powder starts to wear down on the ridges to lock the lid to the body of the container. So when you try to pop the top open, you end up popping the whole lid open.
customer_reviews.author: JmVea

customer_reviews.title: Save you money and use a ziplock
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best. Save your money and use a ziplock bag instead. Not super easy to get the formula out and it’s difficult to clean. It’s also way too bulky for how much formula you need per bottle
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this for my little one stop formula! Very easy to dump into a bottle when needed and easy to fill up with a formula scoop it fits great! Fits right in my side pocket of my diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: Pe Miley

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the lid is not very secure. Can be taken off with minimal force. It’s is not screw on. If inside of a bag with other items it has potential to pop open.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine product. It looks sleek and is tall as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. It looks sleek and is tall as appose to the wider other brands. I give it four stars because you have to be careful where you leave the hole in the top, if it is not centered over one individual slot the formula will get mixed together and is no longer measured.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eberhart

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite formula dispenser yet! Wish I’d of gotten this with my first child! Nest one for traveling! Well worth the money! Have bought 2 of them for each diaper bag! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: the*rustic*ranch

customer_reviews.title: Peefect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. I know this is technically for baby formula, but I needed something big enough to have my protein powder on the go when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy05

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product. Listen to the people who say don’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Listen to the people who say don’t waste your money on this and so yourself a favor , don’t buy this product. The cap doesn’t twist at all. You need a lot strength to open the cap for refills. Returning mine
customer_reviews.author: VICKY

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Right now my son is drinking 4-6 ounces of milk. I think i will be using this for quite sometime. Holds upto 3 feedings. Very spacious as well. Will be good to use later as well for snacks like cereal and stuff. Its worth it! Easy for on the go bottle making! Might get another one just in case you have a long day out! So instead of only 3 feedings i will have 6.
customer_reviews.author: Mzindia

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier with baby!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fill with formula. Also can be used to store snacks in for older children. Easy to clean. The lid locks tight so there is never formula spilling into the diaper bag. Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Taija

customer_reviews.title: The best for on the go bottles!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav baby purchases! Makes bottle feeding on the go SO much easier. Before I would have spilled formula all over when making bottles on the go but now with this it's so much easier. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: bb9

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and mess free
customer_reviews.text: very handy when I don't want to carry the entire formula canister around and you don't have to worry about spillage since it close and stays shut. worth buying rather then showing out extra 10$ for prepackaged formula.
customer_reviews.author: Ntvmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite formula dispenser! Looks great on the counter and super easy to clean. Just throw in the dishwasher. My only complaint, and it’s more of a small problem, is that if it’s not perfectly locked into place you can get a small amount of formula from another compartment. Overall great product though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E

customer_reviews.title: Modern, Compact, and Beautiful Formula Dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. It has a beautiful and modern style. It also match with the Comotomo baby bottles. If you are looking for a modern, beautiful and compact formula dispenser I suggest you to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amauris Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Large, but Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like this - I actually picked it based on the size. I like that it can also hold snacks and will have use beyond the formula days.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Easy and affordable bottle feeding on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Other reviewers complained about product being difficult to fully empty out of each container. I would agree. I have however found if you give it a quick shake, tip it upside down and back before you dispense the formula, the compartment empties just fine.
customer_reviews.author: sjbzher

customer_reviews.title: I love this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser. The hole is big enough to get all the formula out and I don't waste formula or spend my time shaking it to get the formula out into the bottle. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Msmouayang

customer_reviews.title: I really like this, great for snacks and formula
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, great for snacks and formula. It is a little difficult to get the formula out, I have to shake it up and try to pour it a few times which can lead to a bit of a mess but that's not a huge deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Opens easily not working
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser opens easily I cannot use it because if I put it on the diaper bag it will open and all the formula will come out. So sad I was so excited thought it was great but know I cannot use it
customer_reviews.author: odi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for formula for a couple months and now that we're done with formula, I use it for cheerios and other snacks! It's great to travel with and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Loose lid
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty formula/snack container. It's mainly for looks though. When I first opened it to pour formula into a bottle, the whole lid popped off. Too loose. Will easily spill in diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best formula dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This formula dispenser works better than the munchkin or dr. Brown ones we have. The formula doesn’t get stuck to the plastic like it does with the other brands. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Design needs work...
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging, it's easy to find in the diaper bag. What I don't like is the fact that I have to vigorously shake the milk out of it. The milk lays on the sides. Makes it especially hard at night or while riding in a car. I've made a few messes.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and nice design, not the typical flimpsy plastic. I do wish it was more compact but I love how well made it feels and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Saira

customer_reviews.title: Best formula dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Best formula dispenser I’ve had! Formula doesn’t get suck in the holder. Pours out easy into your bottles. No issues here. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I used this when my daughter was young to store her formula and I now use it to store dry cereal as a snack while we are out! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pour out of
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but the top is kind of stiff and it takes a lot of shaking to get he formula out of the hole. I’m using it for powdered Gatorade now. Since it pours easier.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneKS

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to use. Not so wide
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my 2nd child. Inwanted a dispenser that would hold enough formula to make an 8oz bottle (i use Enfamil) and theres room for more. Practical and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bringing formula on the go
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bringing formula on the go. Nice design and easy to pour just one out of. Compartments are also perfectly sized for my bottle brush to fit in it when I want to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I finally settled on a formula dispenser! This is easy to use and clean, the plastic is sturdy and the cap doesn’t pop open easily.
customer_reviews.author: Raisa Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for older babies!!! Holds 4 scoops of formula per section which is almost u heard of!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Would love to see one in silicone which would be safer ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open, especially one handed. Would love to see one in silicone which would be safer than plastic also one with 4 compartments, since for twins all of these with 3 compartments isn't very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be convenient, sturdy, and helpful. However, it is the exact opposite! The lid does not close tightly, and it is easy for the formula powder to come out of it. When you go to pour the powder out of it, it is not a smooth process whatsoever. Instead I have to pound the dispenser against the bottle and shake it multiple times in order to get the powder out. This is not convenient when holding a baby who is anxious to eat. I would not recommend this formula dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t leave home without this! Perfect for in the diaper bag. Able to carry three varying levels of formula for easy to make bottles. No mess. Cleans super easy, top pops right off.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It fits more easily in diaper bags/purses than typical formula dispensers. Recommend that you go up an oz or 2 when packing bottles/formula since this does only have 3 compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this since it doesn't scream baby. Only gripe is that the sections are not sealed as well as I'd like. I've used 2 sections for snacks and the other for formula and formula (though not much) gets into the other 2 sections even when it's closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does its job
customer_reviews.text: Pro: The container is transparent so that I can figure out if I emptied formula inside of it. Cons: The lid is hard to turn. It's so stiff that I even thought it does not spin to the third compartment. If not using it carefully, it seems very possible to spill formula.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. LEE

customer_reviews.title: Good Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear compartments and it feels nice and sturdy. I don't have any issues of it opening in my diaper bag. It can easily hold 4 scoops (8 ounces) of formula. Easy to clean and dries easily.
customer_reviews.author: AANNII

customer_reviews.title: Easily opened, needs better lid.
customer_reviews.text: Great product just needs to have a screw on lid. It can easily open and spill if you’re not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality but it is too big to carry in the bag I wish there was half of its size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches my comotomo
customer_reviews.text: I love this dispenser. Formula comes out as it should and it looks cute. Also matches my comotomo bottles perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Ok at first
customer_reviews.text: I liked because it was easy to store in my baby bag. I like the shape and the different compartments to visually look at. Disliked: the formula doesn't always come out. You have to hit it a few times. If the dispenser tips over and you open it slowly the formula flies everywhere. Hard to clean and get inside the crevices.
customer_reviews.author: danisha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great container
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! We use it for formula or ride cereal while we’re out and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Puffer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a replacement and still find a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement and still find a little of the formula does shift around in the other compartments. I plan to use this for snacks when we are on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: Formula can easily be served on baby bottle !
customer_reviews.text: I tried other formula dispensers and whenever I prepared my baby's bottle formula from other compartments would get mixed with the formula I was using or the other way around. With this formula dispenser I can easily prepare my baby's bottle without adding or subtracting more formula than what it is in the compartment that I choose which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for ready measured baby formulas on the road
customer_reviews.author: precious

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not lock in place
customer_reviews.text: The lid does not lock in place properly, so I’ve poured two servings of formula powder instead is one, ruining the bottle and wasting money. This has happened twice.
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: meh its just ok
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser works ok but could be better to break up clumping
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Almost as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use it for finger snacks, as the top spins too freely to use for powered formula.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy compared to other formula dispensers. It is now a staple in our diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product. I'm currently using it to send ...
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product. I'm currently using it to send a baby cereal and formula mix to daycare. I just wish it were a little slimmer so that I could fit my daughter's name bands around it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, just what you need.
customer_reviews.text: Buying a second one, I have to use soy formula which clumps together making it hard to come out of the holes of other dispensers, Not with the joovy, it slides out very easily. Great design, works well.
customer_reviews.author: matthew klug

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this but you do have to becareful with the cap. If the cap is not twisted properly the contents can get mixed together when tossed into a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Faneeza

customer_reviews.title: Much better design than the munchkin bowl style version
customer_reviews.text: Much better design than the munchkin bowl style version. I keep this full and pre-measured during the day so when I have to quick make a bottle I don't have to measure...it helps if you've also got a toddler around needing you as often as your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherly

customer_reviews.title: Must have even if you don’t formula feed it’s great for snacks and such also
customer_reviews.text: Love this it’s definitely different and cute it good snacks and formula love how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Holds enough for an 8 ounce bottle with cereal
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for when my little guy went to 8 ounces of formula at a time, plus we had to add rice/oatmeal cereal for his reflux. It holds four scoops of formula and cereal with room to spare. I will probably use it for snacks when we no longer need this for formula.
customer_reviews.author: SRobins

customer_reviews.title: Looks the same as in the pic...
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and what I like the most is that it matches my baby's bottles😊....
customer_reviews.author: 🐆🍃AmazonPrincess🍃🐅

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I like this formula dispenser because it’s simple and durable. There are 3 separate servings areas for formula. Will also use for snacks on the go in the future. Cute and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Not five stars.
customer_reviews.text: I really would like to give it five starts, but for some reasons I will not. The dispenser is nice, good design and stylist and it’s a great size. You can use it in the future for your kid’s snack. That is great. The reason why I’m not giving five starts on it is because the top is a little be hard to open and you have to shake really well if you want the formula to come out and after you done with the formula, you will see that there’s still some in the bottle. In addition, the compartment doesn’t come out what makes it difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: MayaStein

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Honestly can’t stand this product. Going to do a return. So hard to get the formula out. I would recommend getting a different design of a formula travel container
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: God send
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My youngest is 10 months old and I am so sad I didn't find this sooner. I bought this for a trip we are taking and thought this would be good for the airport. It literally has been a life saver. No more bringing the whole formula can along and praying you don't drop it. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Randee Lynn Hester

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what expected
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. Holds a good amount. Does not spill or open easy. Fits well in the diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just started giving my 6 month old formula and this dispenser has been a lifesaver. So easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase ! Love the look and function! Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! It has been so helpful. It holds lots of formula and it comes out really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey noll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser is great quality. Only draw back is the top is extremely hard to twist.
customer_reviews.author: Soniya

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread. Bought myself another! Holds 3 scoops of formula plus leaves room for more. This is an essential in my mommy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Perfect formula dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely something I needed on the go for my baby's formula. The design is simple which I love but also made of light weight plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this honestly thought it would be a bit smaller I use it for my babies formula and I love how compact it is and I already have it measured so I just pour it. Love this product might have to purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sepulveda

product_meta.title: Joovy Boob Formula Dispenser, Clear
product_meta.description: Organization is key in the world we live in. Why should feeding your baby add to your already busy day? The joovy formula dispenser makes bottle-feeding on the go a cinch providing you with three 8ounce, tightly-fitted compartments perfect for storing pre-measured formula. Additionally, a handy spout allows you to pour formula directly into the bottle preventing troublesome spills. This convenient multi-tasker also becomes a fantastic snack cup when your baby outgrows their formula.
feature_bullets: The boob formula dispenser makes bottle-feeding on-the-go easier and less messy
Features three 8 ounce. Tightly fitted compartments for storing pre-measured formula
Handy spout top allows pouring directly into a bottle, preventing messy spills
Can also be used as a snack cup when your child outgrows formula
Bpa, pvc, phthalate and lead free

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars547 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
